works.description:
a) "The Nyingma School of Tibetan  
Buddhism: It Fundamentals and History" By Dudjom Rinpoche. Translated and  
edited by Gyurme Dorje and Matthew Kapstein. Copyright 1991, Dudjom  
Rinpoche, Gyurme Dorje and Matthew Kapstein. All Rights Reserved. Published  
by Wisdom Publications, Inc.
ISBN-10: 0-86171-199-8  ISBN-13: 978-0861711994
b) "The Meditator’s Atlas: A Roadmap of the Inner World" By Matthew  
Flickstein. Forward by Bhante Henepola Gunaratana.  Copyright 2007, Matthew  
Flickstein. All Rights Reserved. Published by Wisdom Publications, Inc.
ISBN-10: 0-86171-337-0  ISBN-13: 978-0861710720
c) "The Connected Discourses of the Buddha: A Translation of the Samyutta  
Nikāya." Translated by Bikkhu Bodhi. Copyright 2000, Bikku Bodhi. All  
Rights Reserved. Published by Wisdom Publications, Inc.
ISBN-10: 0-86171-331-1  ISBN-13: 978-0861713318
d) "The Long Discourses of the Buddha: A Translation of the Dīgha Nikāya"  
Translated from the Pali by Maurice Walshe. Copyright 1987, 1995, Maurice  
Walshe. All Rights Reserved. Published by Wisdom Publications, Inc.
ISBN-10: 0-86171-103-3  ISBN-13: 978-0861711031
e) "Mindfulness, Bliss, and Beyond: A Meditator’s Handbook" By Ajahn Brahm.  
Forward by Jack Kornfield. Copyright 2006, Ajahn Brahm. All Rights  
Reserved. Published by Wisdom Publications, Inc.
ISBN-10: 0-86171-275-7  ISBN-13: 978-0861712755
f) "Mindfulness with Breathing: A Manual for Serious Beginners" By Ajahn  
Buddhadasa Bhikkhu. Translated from the Thai by Santikaro Bhikkhu.  
Copyright 1988, 1996, 1997, Evolution/Liberation. All Rights Reserved.  
Published by Wisdom Publications, Inc.
ISBN-10: 0-86171-111-4  ISBN-13: 978-0861711116
g) "Going on Being: Life at the Crossroads of Buddhism and Psychotherapy"  
By Mark Epstein, M.D. Copyright 2001, 2008, Mark Epstein, M.D. All Rights  
Reserved. Published by Wisdom Publications, Inc.
ISBN-10: 0-86171-569-1  ISBN-13: 978-0861715695
h) "Hidden Teachings of Tibet: An Explanation of the Terma Tradition of  
Tibetan Buddhism" By Tulku Thondup Rinpoche. Edited by Harold Talbott.  
Copyright 1986, 1997, Tulku Thondup Rinpoche. All Rights Reserved.  
Published by Wisdom Publications, Inc.
ISBN-10: 0-86171-122-X  ISBN-13: 978-0861711222
